creator: ric_schug1@agilent.com
text:
Using a war file for my application contianing precompiled JSP pages the JSP
pages alway get recompiled under the work directory anyway.

The following settings are from my server.xml:

      <Host name="mmtap2" debug="0" appBase="webapps"
       unpackWARs="false" liveDeploy="false" autoDeploy="true" deployXML="true">

       <Context path="/ematrix" docBase="ematrix.war" debug="0"
                 crossContext="false" reloadable="false" override="true">

          <Logger className="org.apache.catalina.logger.FileLogger"
              directory="/opt/matrixone/mauitest2/logs/tomcat"     
prefix="mmtap2_ematrix." suffix=".log" timestamp="true"/>
              
        </Context>
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 39085 ***
creator: markt@apache.org

text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> 
> *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 39085 ***
The duplicate was incorrectly closed. This should be reopened as
